lexUnit.name: tract.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a short treatise in pamphlet form, typically on a religious subject

sentence.text: Proast 's only published works were three tracts against Locke : The Argument of the Letter Concerning Toleration Briefly Considered ( 1690 ) , A Third Letter Concerning Toleration ( 1691 ) , and ( confusingly ) A Second Letter to the Author of the Three Letters Concerning Toleration ( 1704 ) .
